snippet: As Reno, Nev., seeks to move past an economy grounded for decades by mammoth casinos, it is grasping at various possibilities that have little to do with the industry that defined it.
abstract: Arrival of Indian casinos and the spread of state-sanctioned gambling nationwide has devastated the revenues of Reno, Nev, whose customers came mostly from California; as the city seeks to move past an economy grounded for decades by mammoth casinos, it is grasping at various possibilities that have little to do with the industry that defined it.

byline.contributor: Malia Wollan contributed reporting from San Francisco.

lead_paragraph: As Reno, Nev., seeks to move past an economy grounded for decades by mammoth casinos, it is grasping at various possibilities that have little to do with the industry that defined it.

headline.seo: With Gambling in Decline, Reno Struggles to Reinvent Itself
headline.main: With Gambling in Decline, a Faded Reno Tries to Reinvent Itself
headline.print_headline: With Gambling in Decline, a Faded Reno Tries to Reinvent Itself
